text: Luca Antonio Fiordilino (born 25 July 1996) is an Italian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Venezia in Serie B. ==Club career== Fiordilino started his career at U.S. Città di Palermo in the youth system. In July 2015 he was loaned to Cosenza of Lega Pro. In July 2016 he moved to Lega Pro side Lecce on loan. On 24 July 2019, he signed a 3-year contract with Venezia. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Italian footballers Category:Palermo F.C. players Category:Cosenza Calcio players Category:U.S. Lecce players Category:Venezia F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from Palermo Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Serie B players Category:Serie C players Category:Footballers from Sicily
title: Luca Fiordilino
